name: Broken Clock (itch) (Seva Khusid, gagota, ghoulsteak, Vortex Games)
name_original: Broken Clock (itch) (Seva Khusid, gagota, ghoulsteak, Vortex Games)
description:
A mouse has set up its nest in an old clock. One night it breaks, shattering time - now the mouse is stuck in a loop. Explore the old clock, collect the time shards, and restore time!

Credits

Direction: 　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Seva Khusid

Programming: 　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　BlurKid

Art: 　　　　　　　　　　　  　Sam "ghoulsteak" Ensoll

Music and SFX: 　　　　　 　thegreatapathetic / Kalkiar

Programming and SFX: 　　　Tymon Bulawa-Sobolewski
